mapper.insert: insert into post(num, category, nickname, title, subtitle, fcontent, ccontent, good, hash, report, pdate, url) values(post_seq.nextval, #{category}, #{nickname}, #{title}, #{subtitle}, #{fcontent}, #{ccontent}, 0, #{hash}, 0, sysdate, #{url})
mapper.update: update post set good=good+1 where num=#{num}
mapper.insert: insert into postgood(num, pnum, nickname, pgdate) values(postgood_seq.nextval, #{num}, (select nickname from member where email=#{email}), sysdate)
mapper.update: update post set good=good-1 where num=#{num}
mapper.delete: delete from postgood where pnum=#{num} and nickname=(select nickname from member where email=#{email})
